other_tests.findings: Recurring impairment in pulmonary function, heart anterior to the plane of the chest wall, approximately 6.5 cm chest wall defect.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Significant improvement in pulmonary function post-operatively.

other_tests.findings: Development of a seroma in the left side of the chest wall.
Patient asymptomatic; anterior chest wall demonstrates normal development; struts incorporated in the chest wall without migration or fracture.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Good growth with no apparent interference from the alloplastic struts.
